description:
game introduction
Game Name: Feather Of Praying
Game On:秋之忧郁
Game artist: 雨兮
Game Type: Horror Puzzle
Number of endings: 5
Estimated time of customs clearance: 2~4 hours
Game Description: The first time to do a horror puzzle game, if there is not enough hope that you understand.
There is no scary CG flash map for the whole game. Don't worry about being suddenly scared by CG.
This game has passed 12 rounds of testing. All BUGs have been fixed. If there are any remaining BUGs, please give feedback first time.

Basic button
Move: arrow keys
Survey/Confirmation: Z/Space/Enter
Menu/Cancel: X/ESC
Archive Management: F5
Resolution adjustment: F6
Running: Shift
Feedback channel: 413228337@qq.com
